title: Cheryl Pei Ling LIAN | Web Directory | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Dr Cheryl Lian is an Associate Professor at the Singapore Institute of Technology and a Past President of the Society of Medical Physicists (Singapore).  Having previously served as a medical radiation physicist in public and private healthcare settings, her current applied research projects focus on medical radiation dosimetry, imaging AI and digital innovations in healthcare and medical technology.  As an educator, she is also interested to improve medical radiation science instruction by way of technology-enhanced personalised learning.

text_lines: This question is for testing whether or not you are a human visitor and to prevent automated spam submissions.
Year 1 Coordinator (Diagnostic Radiography and Radiation Therapy programme)
Chair, Cluster Overseas Exposure Programmes Committee
PhD in Medical Physics, University of Wollongong, Australia

Dr Cheryl Lian is an Associate Professor at the Singapore Institute of Technology and a Past President of the Society of Medical Physicists (Singapore).  Having previously served as a medical radiation physicist in public and private healthcare settings, her current applied research projects focus on medical radiation dosimetry, imaging AI and digital innovations in healthcare and medical technology.  As an educator, she is also interested to improve medical radiation science instruction by way of technology-enhanced personalised learning.
Chair, Cluster Overseas Exposure Programmes Committee
Year 1 Coordinator (Diagnostic Radiography and Radiation Therapy programme)
Deputy Programme Director - SIT BSc (Hons) in Diagnostic Radiography
Deputy Programme Director - SIT BSc (Hons) in Radiation Therapy
Masters in Medical Radiation Physics with Distinction
National Institute of Education, Nanyang Technological University
Bachelor of Electrical Engineering with Honours
Australasian College of Physical Scientists and Engineers in Medicine
President, Society of Medical Physicists, Singapore
Vice-President, Society of Medical Physicists, Singapore
Co-Secretary, Organizing Committee 2022 IUPESM World Congress on Medical Physics and Biomedical Engineering
Member, Scientific Committee, 2022 IUPESM World Congress on Medical Physics and Biomedical Engineering
Member, Singapore Accreditation Council- Technical Committee for Medical Imaging
Associate Adult Educator, Institute of Adult Learning
Member, Technical Committee on Radiation Safety and Security in Industrial Applications, National Environment Agency, Singapore
Reviewer, Australasian Physical and Engineering Sciences in Medicine
Blended learning, flipped classroom, case-based learning
Medical Radiation Dosimetry, Imaging and Radiotherapy Physics, Artificial intelligence in medical imaging
